title: Is the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe DLC a Good Deal? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.10.22
description:
Tim and Greg dig through all the Nintendo news, talk about the Mario Kart 8 DLC, and more! 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
We rank the states on KFP today!
Today, we just released a brand-new investigative video essay where Roger exposes the largest gaming hoax of all time... Peter Griffin joining Fortnite. You can watch the full video over at YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames right now!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:55 - NINTENDO DIRECT RECAP
00:27:10 - Do you think the often-rumored Mario Kart 9 could still come out on the Switch? - Best Friends Q:Educator Gamer
00:34:30 - Do you think it'll set a precedent for Nintendo games - Best Friends Q:Beard Adept
00:36:40 - Ad
00:38:50 - BREAKING: Some Details From the Unannounced Resident Evil 4 Remake, Imran @ Fanbyte
https://www.fanbyte.com/news/some-details-from-the-unannounced-resident-evil-4-remake
00:43:30 - ‘Lord of the Rings’ and ‘The Hobbit’ Film and Gaming Rights Up for Sale, Cynthia Littleton @ Variety
00:46:50 - Horizon’s Accessibility Features
00:52:07 - Uncharted’ Audio Book to Be Narrated by Voice Actor Nolan North, Jordan Moreau @ Variety
00:54:55 - Sim 4 Wedding Expansion won’t got to Russia, Luke Plunkett @ Kotaku
00:57:33 - SHU’S bag o indies!
00:58:50 - Out today
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Erin Ashley Simon

We rank the states on KFP today!

Today, we just released a brand-new investigative video essay where Roger exposes the largest gaming hoax of all time... Peter Griffin joining Fortnite. You can watch the full video over at YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames right now!
